examples.example: 看到蝎子那勇敢面对恶劣环境的精神，真让人佩服。

translate.english: Seeing the spirit of the scorpion to bravely face the harsh environment, it is really admirable.

examples.example: 蝎子虽然看起来很特别，但也是大自然中神奇而有趣的生物呢。

translate.english: Scorpions, although they look very special, are also wonderful and interesting creatures in nature.

examples.example: 可爱的蝎子努力地在沙漠中寻找着自己的生存之道。

translate.english: The lovely scorpion tries hard to find its own way of survival in the desert.
